fields.name: ***Consult the Lore** (3x)*:
fields.value: Learn the name of one random non-Mafia killing role alive in the game. Note: You will not receive the same role twice, unless multiple instances of it exist.

fields.name: ***Splash Holy Water** (1x)*:
fields.value: Attack your target with 1/10 your attack power. Unless they are a non-Mafia role with attack power greater than 0.4x, you will not attack and instead be notified your target was unaffected.

fields.name: ***Monster Hunter** (1x, Locked)*:
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Attack your target. Unless they are a non-Mafia role with attack power greater than 0.4x, your attack will fail.
